title: givemetroncom
author: givemetroncom
content: Hello everyone,https://coindik.com/I will talk about my project that we have been working on for a long time.Did ever you wonder where people find the best new cryptocurrency projects, coins and tokens like Doge and Shiba Inu? They use websites like CoinDik. Cryptocurrency projects are listed here before CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko and major exchanges. Find the best crypto moonshots on our website. However: before investing always do your own research (DYOR)! Listing on CoinDik does NOT mean we endorse the project, they could be scams. Be careful with your investments.You can add free tokens and airdrops and offer voting advantages to all users. only registered members can vote and can only 1 vote. vote never spam like other sites and this highlights the best project.we have daily lucky spins section. lucky spin rewards are low  as our website is new. We are constantly improving our website and we care 100% about your ideas.We would appreciate it if you could criticize us harshly.thanks

comments.author: MidNite36
comments.body: Done, the website consists of shit projects, trident protocol? Sigh that pyramid scheme like project? I don't see any reliable new projects on this website, I can name few new projects that can be very big in near future, this website isn't the right way to hunt for new projects, here are few if you need 1. POKT - Pocket Network 2. Gelato Network.3. RMRK4. Agoric5. Stargate Finance The list goes on and on, you can find the links to their website by searching the names online.

comments.author: givemetroncom
comments.body: Quote from: MidNite36 on September 24, 2022, 01:44:51 PMDone, the website consists of shit projects, trident protocol? Sigh that pyramid scheme like project? I don't see any reliable new projects on this website, I can name few new projects that can be very big in near future, this website isn't the right way to hunt for new projects, here are few if you need 1. POKT - Pocket Network 2. Gelato Network.3. RMRK4. Agoric5. Stargate Finance The list goes on and on, you can find the links to their website by searching the names online.Hello ,I think you misunderstood the content of our website. You can add these projects to our website. anyone can add for free.As a result of voting, tokens rise to the top. When the number of users of our website increases, the ranking will always change.we do not list at the top. people are listing . and people add projects and vote

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Quote from: givemetroncom on September 24, 2022, 01:51:03 PM....As a result of voting, tokens rise to the top.This is not really about being the best new token or coin out there but being the most popular one. There are no other metrics other than votes so this makes the ranking questionable already. It's mainly just showing the strength of each community and not about the unique use cases or other important features.

comments.author: givemetroncom
comments.body: Quote from: Yogee on September 25, 2022, 10:50:37 PMQuote from: givemetroncom on September 24, 2022, 01:51:03 PM....As a result of voting, tokens rise to the top.This is not really about being the best new token or coin out there but being the most popular one. There are no other metrics other than votes so this makes the ranking questionable already. It's mainly just showing the strength of each community and not about the unique use cases or other important features.Anyone can create crypto tokens, but they must meet many requirements to be listed on major(coinmarketcap,coingecko) sites.needs a place to promote the project.You can list your project for free on our website and get a community. we actually include a lot of details on the token projects' own pages and add security APIs. We are building a platform where all crypto lovers can discover new projects and expand their visions together.  of course people can always be unreliable so DYOR !
